title: The One Where Lala Spills The Tea On Herself & Welcomes Burn Survivor Aaliyah Shepard
description:
Aaliyah Shepard is an incredibly inspiring 9-year-old burn survivor who along with her amazing mom, Tia, shares her unbelievable story about overcoming the odds and thriving in the face of severe adversity. Aaliyah and her mom detail the fateful day that Aaliyah suffered 3rd, 4th & 5th degree burns over 39% of her body, and how Aaliyah managed to defy the doctor’s prognosis, cheat death, and go on to start her own business (Aaliyahs.heart on Instagram) to help others who may be struggling in life. Plus, Lala spills the tea… on herself, and is interrupted by a very sweet phone call from her baby girl, O!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
